Calculate the pairwise Euclidean distances between the rows of 2 matrices.

get_dist_two_sets.Rd

Calculate the pairwise Euclidean distances between the rows of 2 matrices.

get_dist_two_sets(set1, set2)

Arguments

set1

A numerical matrix.
set2

A numerical matrix.

Value

A matrix of pairwise distances between the rows of 2 matrices.
